comment: The NPC meme contest has been a resounding success! After receiving hundreds of submissions, we picked what we felt were the best memes that reflected Infowars mission of truth-telling.
amr:
# ::snt The NPC meme contest has been a resounding success! After receiving hundreds of submissions, we picked what we felt were the best memes that reflected Infowars mission of truth-telling.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / succeed-01
            :ARG0 (c / contest-02
                  :ARG2 (m2 / meme)
                  :mod (g / government-organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "NPC")))
            :ARG0-of (r / resound-01))
      :snt2 (p / pick-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (m3 / meme
                  :ARG1-of (f / feel-02
                        :ARG0 w)
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (g2 / good-02
                              :ARG1 m3)
                        :ARG3 (m4 / most))
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / reflect-01
                        :ARG2 (m5 / mission-01
                              :ARG0 (p2 / publication
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Infowars"))
                              :ARG1 (t / tell-01
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / truth)))))
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (r3 / receive-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (s2 / submit-01
                              :quant (m6 / multiple
                                    :op1 100))))))

comment: Do not use hate filled messages on posts
amr:
# ::snt Do not use hate filled messages on posts
(u / use-01
      :polarity -
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (m / message-01
            :ARG1-of (f / fill-01
                  :ARG2 (h / hate)))
      :location (p / post-01))

comment: Terms used to offend based on sexual orientation are not acceptable.
amr:
# ::snt Terms used to offend based on sexual orientation are not acceptable.
(p / possible-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (a / accept-01
            :ARG1 (t / term
                  :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                        :ARG2 (o / offend-01))
                  :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                        :ARG2 (o2 / orient-01
                              :ARG2 (s / sex))))))

comment: Homophobic slurs are undermining the contest. Intelligence is appreciated.
amr:
# ::snt Homophobic slurs are undermining the contest. Intelligence is appreciated.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / undermine-01
            :ARG0 (s / slur
                  :mod (h / homophobia))
            :ARG1 (c / contest-02))
      :snt2 (a / appreciate-02
            :ARG1 (ii / intelligent-01)))
